title: BSP chief Mayawati names nephew, Akash Anand, as her successor
selftext:
## BSP chief Mayawati named her nephew, Akash Anand, as her successor at the party meeting on Sunday afternoon. The announcement was made at the party meeting for the upcoming 2024 Lok Sabha elections.

[https://www.indiatoday.in/india/story/bsp-chief-mayawati-names-her-nephew-akash-anand-as-her-successor-sources-2474178-2023-12-10?utm\_source=directhp&utm\_medium=clicktopstories&utm\_campaign=hptopstories](https://www.indiatoday.in/india/story/bsp-chief-mayawati-names-her-nephew-akash-anand-as-her-successor-sources-2474178-2023-12-10?utm_source=directhp&utm_medium=clicktopstories&utm_campaign=hptopstories)
comments: It'll be the last nail in her party and her coffin
